title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\SuggestSmartRepliesResponse
name: SuggestSmartRepliesResponse
description:
The response message for [Participants.SuggestSmartReplies][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.Participants.SuggestSmartReplies].

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.SuggestSmartRepliesResponse

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.smart_reply_answers
params.description: Output only. Multiple reply options provided by smart reply service. The order is based on the rank of the model prediction. The maximum number of the returned replies is set in SmartReplyConfig.

params.name: data.latest_message
params.description: The name of the latest conversation message used to compile suggestion for. Format: projects/<Project ID>/locations/<Location ID>/conversations/<Conversation ID>/messages/<Message ID>.

params.name: data.context_size
params.description: Number of messages prior to and including [latest_message][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.SuggestSmartRepliesResponse.latest_message] to compile the suggestion. It may be smaller than the [SuggestSmartRepliesRequest.context_size][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.SuggestSmartRepliesRequest.context_size] field in the request if there aren't that many messages in the conversation.

methods.name: getSmartReplyAnswers
methods.description:

The maximum number of the returned replies is set in SmartReplyConfig.
